EmailTemplate.subject: IATA Customer Portal Email Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!$Label.ISSP_Email_do_not_reply}
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Thank you for registering to the IATA Customer Portal. You're just one step away from getting access!
Please confirm your email address by clicking here.
For security reasons, this link is valid from 8 hours. After the time limit has expired, you will have to resubmut your request.
Thanks for being part of IATA.
IATA
